DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample DNA laboratory woman BRCA1/BRCA2 mutation carrier may help doctor learn cancer identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This research study look breast cancer risk woman BRCA1/BRCA2 mutation carrier .
DOC.brief_title: Studying Breast Cancer Risk Women Who Are BRCA1/BRCA2 Mutation Carriers
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To identify potential genetic modifier breast cancer risk contribute data genetic information obtain woman BRCA1/BRCA2 mutation carrier enrol clinical trial GOG-0199 international consortium clinical cancer genetics investigator ( CIMBA ) . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients stratify study , country residence , ethnicity , birth cohort . Joint analysis BRCA1 BRCA2 mutation carrier stratify mutation . Previously collect DNA sample analyze genetic variant select candidate gene ( rs16942 BRCA1 , rs2237060 RAD50 , `` SNP3 '' , rs2241193 IGFBP5 ) . The single nucleotide polymorphism ( SNP ) data study select demographic , clinical , epidemiological data obtain baseline questionnaire administer GOG-0199 study submit Consortium Investigators Modifiers BRCA-Associated Cancer ( CIMBA ) Central Database . The epidemiological SNP data contribute Central Database distribute investigator responsible analysis particular SNP set SNPs candidate gene genetic pathway .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Known positive BRCA1/BRCA2 mutation carrier With without personal history breast cancer prior enrollment clinical trial GOG0199 Currently enrol clinical trial GOG0199 AND meet follow criterion : Completed baseline questionnaire ( BQ199 ) Provided information prior breast cancer history , include date diagnosis Provided complete data DNA analysis genetic variant interest Signed approve informed consent authorization permit release personal health information Hormone receptor status specify PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Menopausal status specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
